text: aur jab utara madyan ke paanee par, to paaya usapar logon ka ek samooh, jo (apane pashuon ko) paanee pila raha tha tatha paaya usake peechhe do striyon ko (apane pashuon ko) rokatee hueen. usane kahaah tumhaaree samasya kya hai? donon ne kahaah ham paanee nahin pilaateen, jab tak charavaahe chale na jaayen aur hamaare pita bahut boodhe hain
